entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 1 this morning then steady. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 1 this morning then steady. Wind chill near minus 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 4.
